785160.name: VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Steam Edition
785160.description:
Looking for an easy to use video editing program for your next YouTube video, Let's Play, vlog or meme?With VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Steam Edition you can edit your videos any way you want.Simply select a file, drag & drop it into the timeline and position it where you want. Add text, effects, filters, transitions and music to videos to achieve perfect results and then share them with friends or the whole world.

The perfect introduction to the world of video production: As part of the VEGAS family, VEGAS Movie Studio is powered by the same technology as VEGAS Pro, the fastest and most flexible video editing program on the market.

Highlights

  • Any way you want it: Flexible user interface with a hamburger menu system
  • Dive right in: Quick start window with essential first steps
  • Simplified media import via drag & drop
  • Improved support for smartphone videos (including iPhone)
  • New OFX plug-ins: For Hollywood looks & "tiny planet" effect
  • Keep everything in order: Clear designed timeline with event healing
  • Goodbye to long rendering times: Advanced hardware acceleration

Video and audio production

Innovative functions for intuitive editing
Who said video editing has to be complicated? VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Steam Edition makes editing videos a whole lot of fun. Edit, retouch and organize images and videos easily, with amazing special effects, sophisticated titles and customized music. Edit your gameplays or vlogs natively in resolutions of up to 4K, then upload the results directly to your channel and share with friends, family and your subscribers.

Share your results

When your video is finished, sharing it is easy – just use the program wizards to quickly upload your videos and gameplays to Facebook, YouTube and Vimeo. VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Steam Edition automatically uploads your video in the best format for the platform you select. So what are you waiting for? Share your video with the world!
